content.rendered: What is your true name? Where is your true home? Zen Master Thich Nhat Hanh demonstrates how connecting with our ancestors and our unique cultural backgrounds can lead us to a deeper sense of community. The book includes insights on how to heal our individual and collective suffering, personal stories from people of many backgrounds and teachings on mindfulness practice. This is a deeply inspirational and practical guide.
